# GPsim: An R Package for Simulating Gaussian Processes

The R package `GPsim` is a simulation framework for generating realizations of both stationary and nonstationary Gaussian Processes (GPs), which allows users to make use of a wide range of simulation designs including arbitrary domains and user-defined covariance models. <span style="color:red">This r package is not available now.</span>

## Installation

```{install}
devtools::install_github("myeongjong/GPsim")
```
